entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update SDK Containerization base image telemetry to account for Azure Functions base image usage #44732
  • Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref package not referenced when targeting .NET 5.0 in .NET 9.0 RC.2 SDK #44705
  • The error "Unable to find package Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset with version (= 10.0.100-alpha.1.24556.12)" appeared when creating the .NET project based on latest .NET SDK 10.0 with 17.12.0 Preview 5.0 #44703
  • rename `_SuppressWinFormsTrimError` to `_SuppressWinFormsTrimWarning` #44702

Closed

  • dotnet list package --vulnerable ignores auditSources in NuGet.Config #44722
  • CLI - dotnet workload restore fails on solution if there is a .esproj project #44587

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44729
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44728
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] improve SDK incremental builds by not running crossgen on inner loop builds #44726
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Separate build #44699
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24556.1 #44685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • improve SDK incremental builds by not running redist-installer layout generation on inner loop builds #44687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update vmr-build.yml #44711
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use STJToolsetVersion property and use SkipUnchangedFiles metadata #44709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet-watch argument parsing to use forward options from child commands #44631
    untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44695
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix OCI image tarball #44693
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
